A comparison of the validity of SEARCH, YIS-2 and PROJAHNMO studies to identify very 
severe disease and death was conducted using the Mirzapur trial database. The results of 
this comparison are shown in Table 4. About 2%, 7% and 6% of newborns respectively 
were found to have severe illness according to the algorithm.
Table 4. Comparison of validity of three study algorithms
